column5: About 10min outside of Downtown Denton lies a peaceful retreat in Argyle, TX. This house is rooted in the Denton culture with unique home goods and art pieces made by local artisans. You'll be able to enjoy the wildlife and calm the house provides as well as enjoy the art and culture the neighboring cities have to offer. Anyone of all ages will enjoy this house as it can be used for a multitude of purposes.
column8: The Echo Lab House...Tranquil house on the hill
